title: The Trip (K)
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios and Morton Schindel
brief_description: Louie is lonely when he moves out of his neighbourhood - so he constructs an imaginary world in a shoe box and flies off in his toy plane to visit old friends. The adventure helps Louie discover that friends are friends wherever you are. Based on the book by Ezra Jack Keats. Narrated by Charles Turner.
